Usage imbued into a ranged weapon ikon, or a melee weapon ikon with the thrown trait

As you prepare to shoot your weapon, you invoke divine serpents that bind your enemies. The imbued ikon gains the following ability.

Transcendenceâ€”Coiling Serpents 2 (transcendence) Make a ranged Strike with your ikon. If the Strike hits, the target must succeed at a @Check[reflex|against:class] save against your class DC or the arrow transforms into a multitude of ethereal snakes that coil around the target, immobilizing it until it succeeds at an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] attempt against your class DC.
